class deeperwin.kfac_ferminet_alpha.estimator.CurvatureEstimator(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: deeperwin.kfac_ferminet_alpha.utils.Stateful

Curvature estimator class supporting various curvature approximations.

Parameters

parameter_structured_vector – Structure equivalent to the parameters of the model.

Returns

A structured identical to vectors containing the product.

multiply(parameter_structured_vector: Any) → Any[source]

Multiplies the vectors by the corresponding (damped) blocks.

Parameters

parameter_structured_vector – A vector in the same structure as the parameters of the model.

Returns

A structured identical to vectors containing the product.

multiply_matpower(parameter_structured_vector: deeperwin.kfac_ferminet_alpha.estimator._StructureT, exp: int) → deeperwin.kfac_ferminet_alpha.estimator._StructureT[source]

Multiplies the vectors by the corresponding matrix powers of the blocks.

Parameters

  • parameter_structured_vector – A vector in the same structure as the parameters of the model.

  • exp – A float representing the power to raise the blocks by before multiplying it by the vector.

Returns

A structured identical to vectors containing the product.
